channel.title: Need A hoster For my server Pkerinferno! ( for a rs acc )
channel.description:
If you can I'll give you a level 92 rs acconut with 86 fishing!!!!
Hey guys... My last hoster quit on me :(
And iv'e been looking For a hoster For a very long time :(
One that is actually dedicated... Comes on the server And i's nice
Information: Forums have 112 members like 100 ppl Begging for the server To come online :) I'll give you download link to my source through msn
Requirements: at least 18/7 - 20/7 No lag until 25 players + Wont give random ppl mod / admin / Reck the server, ban ppl for no reason Has to be loyal :D
If you are the god-send I am looking for please Add my msn! Im waiting :( Crying for sum1 Who fits those requirements
[size=18pt]pkerinferno@hotmail.com[/size][br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 05, 2008, 01:11:22 AM[/size][hr]Cmon guys+ - :D
